ifFalseActivities.name: Load CDM Entity to Bronze Delta

ifTrueActivities.name: Load CDM Entity to Bronze Full

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select max([DATEUPD]) as WATERMARK ,'@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}' as TABLE_NAME
FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]

Select max([DATEUPD]) as WATERMARK ,'@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}' as TABLE_NAME
FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]

SELECT COALESCE([WATERMARK]),'1900-01-01') AS [WATERMARK_DELTA]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_TABLES] where DATABASE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}' AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}'

SELECT 
COLUMN_NAME as [COLUMN NAME]

  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS] WHERE DATABASE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}' AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' AND WATERMARK_COLUMN=1

SELECT 
COLUMN_NAME as [COLUMN NAME]

  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL01_COLUMNS] WHERE DATABASE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}' AND TABLE_NAME='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' AND WATERMARK_COLUMN=1

SELECT [WATERMARK]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_TABLES]
  where TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}'
  and DATABASE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}'

Select max([Sys_RowNumber]) as NewWatermark FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
where Sys_RowNumber > @{variables('v_Watermark')}

text.value:
create view [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]
as

SELECT 
cast([timestamp] as bigint)as [Sys_RowNumber],
@{concat(join(variables('ColumnString'),',' ) )} FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]

if object_id('[edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}', 'V') 
is not null drop view [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @@s VARCHAR(MAX) 

DECLARE @@tablename VARCHAR(500) ='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}' 
DECLARE @@schemaname VARCHAR(500) ='@{pipeline().parameters.pm_SchemaName}' 

 

SELECT @@s = ISNULL(@@s+', ','') + '[' + c.name + ']' + ' as ['+replace(replace(replace(c.name,' ',''),'(',''),')','') +'] ' 

FROM sys.all_columns c, sys.tables t, sys.schemas s

where c.object_id = t.object_id 
and t.schema_id  = s.schema_id

 

SELECT 'select ' + @@s + ' from ' + @@tablename as SelectionString

text.value:
if object_id('[edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}', 'V') 
is not null drop view [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{replace(replace(replace(replace(join(split(pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName,' '),''),'_',''),'-',''),'(',''),')','')}]
